original_text: After they had gone into the city of Samaria, Elisha prayed again, ‘ Lord, please open the eyes of these men so that they can see again.’ The Lord opened their eyes. Now they could see that they were in the middle of Samaria!
korean_text: 사마리아에 들어갈 때에 엘리사가 이르되 여호와여 이 무리의 눈을 열어서 보게 하옵소서 하니 여호와께서 그들의 눈을 여시매 그들이 보니 자기들이 사마리아 가운데에 있더라

sentences.original_text: After they had gone into the city of Samaria
'Lord, please open the eyes of these men'
so that they can see again'
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 다시 볼 수 있도록 하십시오'

sentences.original_text: that they were in the middle of Samaria!
